full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Reference Notice
- **Title (English)**: Cargo Net, Aerial Delivery (300 lbs)
- **Title (French)**: Filet, Parachute Matériel (300 livres)
- **Reference Number**: CB-295-84677854

### Solicitation Information

- **Amendment Number**: 0
- **Solicitation Number**: W8485-258436/A
- **Publication Date**: November 7, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 11, 2024, 2:00 PM
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 12, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Procurement Details

- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: World
- **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Solicitation Type

- **Solicitation Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Contracting Entity
- **Contracting Entity Name (English)**: Department of General Aerospace and Electronic Warfare
- **Contracting Entity Address (English)**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Tender Information

- **Tender Description**: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for cargo nets and parachutes. The delivery is requested to 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by March 2025.
- **Items Required**:
    * 30 Net, Cargo, Aerial Delivery, Part No.: ML6004-6, NCAGE: L3969, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal
    * 30 Net, Cargo, Aerial Delivery, Part No.: ML6004-6, NCAGE: L3969, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Dany Lebel
- **Contact Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
- **Contact Phone**: (000) 000-0000

### Tender Documents

- **Tender Documents**: [Download PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51260/w8485-258436a---cargo-net-rfp.pdf) (English)
- **Tender Documents**: [Download PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default
